Package org.husky.emed.cda.services.readers

Class DosageInstructionsReader

java.lang.Object
org.husky.emed.cda.services.readers.DosageInstructionsReader
Direct Known Subclasses:
SubAdmEntryReader
public class DosageInstructionsReader extends Object
A reader for CDA-CH-EMED Dosage Instructions Content Module (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.9.1.3.6).

The following elements part of the Dosage Instructions:

  • Prescription Item Entry Additional Template ID
  • Effective Time (Duration of Treatment)
  • Medication Frequency
  • Route of Administration
  • Approach Site Code
  • Dose Quantity
  • Rate Quantity
  • Related Components
Author:
Quentin Ligier

    • getRepeatNumber

      public Optional<Integer> getRepeatNumber()
      Returns the number of repeats/refills. It contains a non-zero integer if it's limited, it's zero if no repeat/refill is authorized and it's empty if unlimited repeats/refills are authorized.
      Returns:
      an Optional that may contain the limit number of repeats/refills.
